name: Apache Flume
description: Apache Flume is a distributed, reliable, and available service for efficiently collecting, aggregating, and moving large amounts of log data. It has a simple and flexible architecture based on streaming data flows.

down.kafka: Supports sinks and sources in Apache Kafka
down.zookeeper: Flume can use zookeeper as its configuration store
down.hdfs: Supports sinks and sources in HDFS
down.hbase: Supports sinks and sources in HBase
down.hive: Flume supports outputting data for use by Hive
